description:
Your favourite tunes, no strings attached. The Push Active earbuds make it easy to take your music and podcasts with you, wherever you go. With their integrated mics, these earbuds connect you to your phone’s voice assistant, just say “Hey SkullCandy” and open apps, take pictures, and more. Onboard Tile location tech means that if you misplace your earbuds, all you need to do is bring up the Tile app and track them down. And the compact carrying case doubles as a charger, giving you up to 44 hours of music, podcasts, and calls.

  • Tile™ location technology in each earbud, so if you lose one, you’ll be able to find it
  • Voice controls give you access to Alexa, Siri, and more
  • Stay aware mode lets you hear your music and what’s going on around you
  • Bluetooth® connectivity with up to 10m range
  • LED indicator light displays connection info and battery status
  • Integrated microphones for taking calls
  • Up to 10 hours of music or talk time, and the carrying case charges the earbuds for another 34 hours
  • Case charges via USB-C
  • 3 sizes of comfortable silicone earpads to keep the earbuds anchored
  • IP55 water resistance isn’t bothered by sweat, rain or anything else Mother nature might throw at you
  • Quick charge gives you 2 hours of music with just a 10 minute charge
  • Skull-IQ app and firmware updates add new features
  • Adjustable 5-band equalizer lets you personalize your sound
  • Integrated buttons let you answer calls, control your music, and are fully customizable through the free Skullcandy app
name: Skullcandy Push Active True Wireless Earbuds
